turns.content:
Finding the right shoes when you have wide feet can be a challenge. Here are three great options to consider:

1. New Balance 990v5: This shoe has a wide range of sizes and widths, making it a great option for those with wider feet. It also features a supportive and comfortable design, with plenty of cushioning and stability.
2. ASICS Gel-Kayano 27: This shoe is designed for runners with wider feet, offering plenty of support and stability. It features a spacious toe box and a comfortable fit, making it a great option for those with wider feet.
3. Brooks Ghost 13: This shoe has a roomy toe box and a comfortable fit, making it a great option for those with wider feet. It also features plenty of cushioning and support, making it a great choice for running or everyday wear.
